attributes.action: increase the allowances paid to disabled people .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the allowance has not increased at the same rate as the state pension . disabled people do not get any of the heating allowances the oaps get . and are on the whole living in more poverty than oaps. the last increase is to be april and that will be less than £2  which is a little more than a loaf of bread . 
  Gordon Brown should look at the people he is letting down because they are disavanged .
  this petition is for the correct inflation rates to be given to disabled people so they can have a allowance they can live on , not just exsist.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
